title: Matías Schröder
intro: I am a 22 years old full-stack developer. I look forward to a job as blockchain developer. I've been proggraming with Web3, testing and deploying in Hardhat, using Infura and Alchemy nodes. I can use Ganache and Truffle too. Also, I have the fundamental knowledge of how different blockchains work.
